title: Beneath the Surface: How Large Language Models Reflect Hidden Bias
details: J Pan, C Raj, Z Yao, Z Zhu - arXiv preprint arXiv:2502.19749, 2025
abstract: The exceptional performance of Large Language Models (LLMs) often comes with the unintended propagation of social biases embedded in their training data. While existing benchmarks evaluate overt bias through direct term associations between …
